channel.title: Meh bootloader messed up D:
channel.description:
So for the 1000000th time I decided to duel boot BT5 and windows. The only thing I did differently this time was use windows 8 instead of 7.
The only options its giving me is BT5, BT5 recovery and Windows recovery. Any idea on how to fix that? I'd like to use windows again sometime so it would be convenient to have the option to boot it available.
dont worry guys, i fixed it.

item.title: Meh bootloader messed up D:

item.description:
